name: The Murlocket
flavorText: Dredged from the murky shores of Lake Chu, this disturbing amulet emits strange sounds when held to one's ear.
flavorTextHtml: Dredged from the murky shores of Lake Chu, this disturbing amulet emits strange sounds when held to one's ear.

secondary.textHtml: Call forth a creature from the depths.
secondary.text: Call forth a creature from the depths.
